item.title: Unity3D animating and attaching armour
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Frell:

It should be skinned to the skeleton using an app like maya or 3ds max, and then on the mesh in unity you’ll see a skinned mesh renderer component with a slot for skeleton.

Hell yea thanks frell will your unity skillz, btw I’m making a mobile android rs themed game. So far I have it where it accepts input from phones for player movement to specific positions and clipping so he can’t walk through walls and shiz. Now my next step is the player animations and stuff so I wanna get some basic walk anims and then add weapons and armour. Figured I haven’t seen a well rounded android adventure game like rs so why not make one
